actions.text: Mr. Anderson moved to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution.
Mr. Clinger demanded a second on the motion to suspend the rules.
On ordering a second Agreed to without objection.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate.
On motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution Agreed to by voice vote.
Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

Rule provides for consideration of H.R. 3386. Upon adoption of this resolution the bill shall be taken from the Speaker's table with Senate amendment to the text and the amendment shall be considered as agreed to with an amendment in the nature of a substitute and an amendment to the title.

official_title: To provide for consideration of the Senate amendments to (H.R. 3386).

summary.text: Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 3386 (transportation of hazardous substances) and agreeing to the Senate amendment thereto with amendments.

titles.title: To provide for consideration of the Senate amendments to (H.R. 3386).
